channel.title: Authors on Pengpeng Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Pengpeng Liu

item.description: I am currently a Ph.D. student in Computer Science and Engineering, The Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK), supervised by Prof. Michael R. Lyu and Prof. Irwin King. Before that, I got the B.Eng. degree in the Department of Electronic Engineering, Tsinghua University. My research interests include computer vision, deep learning and machine learning.
